H0.text: What is the only sequel to win an Academy Award for Best Picture. The Godfather: Part III

H1.text: What is the only sequel to win an Academy Award for Best Picture. Terminator 2: Judgment Day

H2.text: What is the only sequel to win an Academy Award for Best Picture. Aliens

H3.text: What is the only sequel to win an Academy Award for Best Picture. TGP2

A4.text: The Godfather Part II and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King are the only sequels to have won the award

A5.text: It is the only film in the trilogy not to win for Best Picture, or any other Academy Award for that matter
